title: Love Is Blind
original_name: ラブ・イズ・ブラインド
sinopse:
1. Love Is Blind
2. Kojirase Cherry
3. Renai wa Zangyou no Ato de
4. Omae ja Nai kara.
5. Sensei, Ore to H shiyo!

Note: Story 1 was collected in Pink Gold, story 2 was collected in Erohon♥: Bukkake, and story 5 was collected in b-BOY Shachiku.
